Message: Sir mai 1 st jan 2025 se veg hu or after 18 years old vegan banunga ( jab self dependent ho jaaunga ). mera sawal tha ki hume pata hai ki non veg glt hai or uska painaam achha ni hoga but jo foreign countries hai ( 95% countries ) mei  non veg hi majority mei hai including most developed one's ( japan , us , most of europian and others )or wo log successful bhi ban jaate hai toh kya success ka veg non veg se lena dena ni hai ? and here definition of success for me is to have a peaceful environment. having good infrastructure, good waste management system and public safety and overall well-being.
